body_html:
13:00:07 INFO: From Executing genrule @local_config_python//:numpy_include:
13:00:07 26 File(s) copied
13:00:07 INFO: From Executing genrule @local_config_python//:python_include:
13:00:07 100 File(s) copied

This indicates the local_python_config problem is fixed.

The new error we got:

13:00:10 ERROR: missing input file '@local_jdk//:bin/jar'

is because on Windows it should be @local_jdk//:bin/jar.exe which is already fixed at bazelbuild/bazel@c77eac9.
But the fix is not in 0.4.5. We need to update Bazel to 0.5.0 once it's released.
body_text:
13:00:07 INFO: From Executing genrule @local_config_python//:numpy_include:
13:00:07 26 File(s) copied
13:00:07 INFO: From Executing genrule @local_config_python//:python_include:
13:00:07 100 File(s) copied

This indicates the local_python_config problem is fixed.
The new error we got:
13:00:10 ERROR: missing input file '@local_jdk//:bin/jar'

is because on Windows it should be @local_jdk//:bin/jar.exe which is already fixed at bazelbuild/bazel@c77eac9.
But the fix is not in 0.4.5. We need to update Bazel to 0.5.0 once it's released.
body:
```
13:00:07 INFO: From Executing genrule @local_config_python//:numpy_include:
13:00:07 26 File(s) copied
13:00:07 INFO: From Executing genrule @local_config_python//:python_include:
13:00:07 100 File(s) copied
```
This indicates the local_python_config problem is fixed.

The new error we got:
```
13:00:10 ERROR: missing input file '@local_jdk//:bin/jar'
```
is because on Windows it should be `@local_jdk//:bin/jar.exe` which is already fixed at https://github.com/bazelbuild/bazel/commit/c77eac95ffdee4f127e20266c41cb92cec2a8956.
But the fix is not in 0.4.5. We need to update Bazel to 0.5.0 once it's released.
